project_slug.title: Project slug
project_slug.description: Directory/repo name to create. Lowercase, numbers, dashes or underscores.

description.title: Project description
description.description: One-line summary for README and pyproject.
description.default: Examples and helpers for using the Animica Python SDK against a devnet/testnet.

rpc_http_url.title: RPC HTTP URL
rpc_http_url.description: Node JSON-RPC endpoint (HTTP). By default, local devnet: FastAPI mounts JSON-RPC at /rpc.

rpc_ws_url.title: RPC WebSocket URL
rpc_ws_url.description: Node WebSocket endpoint for subscriptions. Default FastAPI mount is /ws on the same port.

chain_id.title: Chain ID
chain_id.description: Numeric chain identifier (animica:1 mainnet, :2 testnet, :1337 devnet).

include_examples.title: Include example scripts
include_examples.description: Generate example scripts (deploy counter, subscribe, send transfer).
